description: This file defines a Flutter widget for creating, editing, and deleting note entries in a note-taking application. It uses provider for state management, and provides UI components including text fields and dialog confirmations.

classes.name: NoteEditorPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget for adding or editing a note, with associated state class _NoteEditorPageState.

classes.name: _NoteEditorPageState
classes.description: State class managing the note editing form, including loading existing note data, saving, deleting, and UI interaction.

classes.name: _MetaInfo
classes.description: StatelessWidget displaying metadata (creation and last updated timestamps) for a note.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state, loads existing note if noteId is provided.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Handles saving new or updated notes via provider and navigates back.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Handles deleting the current note with confirmation dialog, then navigating back.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the note editor page.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the _MetaInfo widget displaying timestamps.
